description: A verbatim record could not be interpreted at all and has been ignored.
name: not interpreted

description: Escaped characters such as html entities have been unescaped during interpretation. The following escaped character formats are recognized:  1) named, decimal or hexadecimal xml & html entities  2) unicode entities U+0026  3) hexadecimal or octal java unicode entites  4) CSS & ECMA Javascript entities
name: escaped characters

description: Identifier for a reference could not be resolved. This can be from any entity, e.g. name, distribution, vernaculars, etc
name: reference id invalid

description: A taxon, name or reference with duplicate ids. We remove the subsequent records but flag the first record with this issue.
name: id not unique

description: Any of the coldp:link, dc:references, acef:InfraSpeciesURL, acef:SpeciesURL or other terms that are supposed to be URLs cannot be interpreted into a valid URL
name: url invalid

description: Date string was provided a year, but month and/or day were absent
name: partial date

description: The CSV record before this one had to be ignored because it had no content or wrong number of columns. Often indicates a serious delimiter problem
name: previous line skipped

description: A taxon or name relation has an identical ID as the related ID and relates to itself. We ignore such self referenced records but flag them with this issue.
name: self referenced relation

description: The scientific name string could not be parsed at all, but appears to be a parsable name type, i.e. it is not classified as a virus or hybrid formula.
name: unparsable name

description: The beginning of the scientific name string was parsed, but there is additional information in the string that was not understood.
name: partially parsable name

description: The authorship string could not be parsed.
name: unparsable authorship

description: The name has been classified as doubtful by the parser.
name: doubtful name

description: Authorship found in scientificName and scientificNameAuthorship differ.
name: inconsistent authorship

description: An parsed, but inconsistent name. E.g. the rank of the name does not match the given name parts or suffices.
name: inconsistent name

description: The parsed scientific name string results in a different name then was given as already atomized parts.
name: parsed name differs

description: The name parts contain unusual characters.
name: unusual name characters

description: At least one epithet contains multiple words before parsing.
name: multi word epithet

description: At least one epithet contains upper case letters.
name: uppercase epithet

description: The name contains a bibliographic reference
name: contains reference

description: At least one epithet equals literal value "null" or "none".
name: null epithet

description: At least one epithet is blacklisted by the name parser
name: blacklisted epithet

description: Name was declared a species but contains infraspecific epithet
name: subspecies assigned

description: Lower case monomial match
name: lc monomial

description: Indetermined species name with "lower" rank than epithets
name: indetermined

description: Binomial with rank higher than species aggregate
name: higher rank binomial

description: Question marks removed from name
name: question marks removed

description: Removed enclosing quotes from name
name: repl enclosing quote

description: Epithet without genus
name: missing genus

description: The nomenclatural status could not be interpreted
name: nomenclatural status invalid

description: The name authorship contains nomenclatural status notes that are transferred to the name
name: authorship contains nomenclatural note

description: The name authorship contains nomenclatural status notes which conflict with the explicitly given status
name: conflicting nomenclatural status

description: dwc:nomenclaturalCode could not be interpreted
name: nomenclatural code invalid

description: A recombination with a basionym authorship which does not match the authorship of the linked basionym
name: basionym author mismatch

description: Record has a original name (basionym) relationship which was derived from name & authorship comparison, but did not exist explicitly in the data. Provisional catalogue specific issue.
name: basionym derived

description: There have been more than one accepted name in a homotypical basionym group of names. Provisional catalogue specific issue.
name: conflicting basionym combination

description: A basionym that claims to have itself another basionym.
name: chained basionym

description: A scientific name has been used to point to another record (synonym->accepted, combination->basionym) which is not unique and refers to several records.
name: name not unique

description: A potential chresonym exists in the dataset.
name: potential chresonym

description: A bi/trinomial name published earlier than the parent genus was published. This might indicate that the name should rather be a recombination.
name: published before genus

description: The name id pointing to a related original name could not be resolved.
name: basionym id invalid

description: dwc:taxonRank could not be interpreted
name: rank invalid

description: The name (authorship) contains unmatched brackets, i.e. it misses closing brackets usually indicating truncated data.
name: unmatched name brackets

description: The name or its authorship appears to be truncated.
name: truncated name

description: Same name appears several time in dataset.
name: duplicate name

description: Multiple variants of the same name appear several times in the dataset.
name: name variant

description: The name authorship contains taxonomic notes that are transferred to the name usage
name: authorship contains taxonomic note

description: type status could not be interpreted
name: type status invalid

description: decimal coordinate could not be interpreted
name: lat lon invalid

description: altitude could not be interpreted. Should be a plain integer.
name: altitude invalid

description: decimal coordinate could not be interpreted
name: country invalid

description: Multiple (accepted) taxa appear to be orthographic variants in the dataset.
name: taxon variant

description: Identifier for a taxon/name could not be resolved.
name: taxon id invalid

description: The name object for col:nameId could not be resolved.
name: name id invalid

description: The value for dwc:parentNameUsageID could not be resolved or is missing.
name: parent id invalid

description: The value for dwc:acceptedNameUsageID could not be resolved or is missing.
name: accepted id invalid

description: Synonym lacking an accepted name. These will be treated as bare names in the datastore
name: accepted name missing

description: The accepted infraspecific name does not have an accepted species in it's classification.
name: parent species missing

description: dwc:taxonomicStatus could not be interpreted
name: taxonomic status invalid

description: col:provisional is no boolean
name: provisional status invalid

description: environment contains values that cannot be interpreted
name: environment invalid

description: acef:IsExtinct contains values that cannot be interpreted
name: is extinct invalid

description: The usage extinct flag was set because the name contained an extinct symbol
name: name contains extinct symbol

description: The geochronological time given cannot be interpreted
name: geotime invalid

description: acef:LTSDate cannot be interpreted into a date
name: scrutinizer date invalid

description: If a synonym points to another synonym as its accepted taxon the chain is resolved.
name: chained synonym

description: The child parent classification resulted into a cycle that needed to be resolved/cut.
name: parent cycle

description: An accepted taxon which has a synonym as its parent. This relation is moved to the synonyms accepted name if possible, otherwise just removed.
name: synonym parent

description: The given ranks of the names in the classification hierarchy do not follow the hierarchy of ranks.
name: classification rank order invalid

description: The denormalized classification could not be applied to the name usage. For example if the id based classification has no ranks.
name: classification not applied

description: The (accepted) bi/trinomial name does not match the parent genus/species. For example the species Picea alba with a parent genus Abies is a mismatch.
name: parent name mismatch

description: The taxonomic status was programmatically derived. E.g. a synonym made a misapplied name or ambigous synonym based on name annotations.
name: derived taxonomic status

description: The given taxonomic status appears unlikely. E.g. a misapplied name without any taxonomic remark indicating the source it was misapplied in.
name: taxonomic status doubtful

description: A synonym which originally had some associated data (descriptions distributions, media items, vernacular names, bibliography) but which was moved to its accepted taxon.
name: synonym data moved

description: A synonym which originally had some associated data (descriptions distributions, media items, vernacular names, bibliography) but which was removed as it lacks an accepted taxon.
name: synonym data removed

description: ACEF reference type values unparsable or missing
name: reftype invalid

description: The taxonomic concept reference was given explicitly and implicitly through the names authorship
name: according to conflict

description: A vernacular name extension record attached to this name usage is empty or clearly not a name.
name: vernacular name invalid

description: A vernacular name extension record attached to this name usage has an unparsable language.
name: vernacular language invalid

description: A vernacular name extension record attached to this name usage has an unparsable sex.
name: vernacular sex invalid

description: A vernacular name extension record attached to this name usage has an unparsable country.
name: vernacular country invalid

description: Transliterated vernacular name missing and generated automatically. Assembled Catalogue specific issue.
name: vernacular name transliterated

description: A distribution record is invalid and cannot be interpreted at all.
name: distribution invalid

description: A distribution record contains an invalid area name/code.
name: distribution area invalid

description: A distribution record contains an invalid status code.
name: distribution status invalid

description: A distribution record contains an unsupported gazeteer name.
name: distribution gazeteer invalid

description: The created date for the media record cannot be interpreted
name: media created date invalid

description: The given year of publication cannot be parsed into a sensible integer year.
name: unparsable year

description: The given year of publication is unlikely to be real.
name: unlikely year

description: There are multiple references for the original publication of a name.
name: multiple published in references

description: The reference could not be parsed and broken down into a sensible record.
name: unparsable reference

description: The required reference type could not be parsed and a default has been assigned.
name: unparsable reference type

description: The name (authorship) contains unmatched brackets, i.e. it misses closing brackets usually indicating truncated data.
name: unmatched reference brackets

description: Value for container title was stored literally when it probably included additional information, e.g. pages
name: citation container title unparsed

description: Value for reference details was stored literally and placed in CSL page
name: citation details unparsed

description: Value for reference authors was stored literally and not broken down into individual authors
name: citation authors unparsed

description: Value for citation was accepted as-is
name: citation unparsed

description: The treatment document could not be read.
name: unparsable treatment

description: The required treatment format could not be parsed.
name: unparsable treament format

description: The species estimate could not be parsed to a positive integer.
name: estimate invalid

description: The species estimate type could not be parsed.
name: estimate type invalid

description: Invisible characters such as control characters have been removed or exotic alternatives for spaces been replaced with their canonical form.
name: invisible characters

description: Potential homoglyphs of the latin alphabet are encountered.In vernacular names, authors or references this can be perfectly fine content if other scripts than latin, e.g. cyrillic or greek are used.
name: homoglyph characters

description: Species interaction without a related name.Neither relatedTaxonID nor relatedScientificName is given with a valid value.
name: related name missing

description: Seperate diacritic characters such as the acute, grave or circumflex, are present on their own. They should only exist in combination with a letter.
name: diacritic characters

description: At least one monomial of the parsed name contains multiple words.
name: multi word monomial

description: At least one monomial of the parsed name in not using title case.
name: wrong monomial case

description: The interpreted authorship was removed because it was not considered appropriate.
name: authorship removed

description: The given DOI does not exist in Crossref.
name: doi not found

description: The given DOI could not be resolved by Crossref. This might be a temporary problem.
name: doi unresolved

description: A type material record attached to this name has an unparsable sex.
name: type material sex invalid

description: The alternative identifier for a taxon, name or reference is lacking an identifier scope.
name: identifier without scope
